response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and relevance to your needs. This exceptional item is tailored to meet your specific requirements and comes with a host of benefits designed to enhance your experience. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it is worth every penny of $12,000. We are confident that this investment will not only provide immediate satisfaction but also long-term benefits. Considering its worth, we kindly invite you to seize this opportunity to elevate your standards with our product. If you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will guide you through the seamless purchase process. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 12000}
